Package com.emeryferrari.jse3d.gfx

Class Display

java.lang.Object
com.aparapi.Kernel
com.emeryferrari.jse3d.gfx.Display
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Display
extends com.aparapi.Kernel
Represents a jse3d frame.
Since:
1.0 beta
Author:
Emery Ferrari, Sam Krug

    int addParticle​(com.emeryferrari.jse3d.obj.Particle particle)
    Adds a particle to the particle system.
    Display disableAliasing()
    Disables aliasing (enables anti-aliasing).
    Display disableAntialiasing()
    Disables anti-aliasing (enables aliasing).
    Display disableCameraPositionPrinting()
    Disables printing the camera's actual position to the frame.
    Display disableDithering()
    Disables dithering.
    Display disableFaceRendering()
    Disables rendering Faces in the Scene.

    Disables usage of the FPS cap.
    Display disableFPSLogging()
    Disables printing the current FPS to the console.
    Display disableFractionalMetrics()
    Disables fractional metrics.
    Display disableLineRendering()
    Disables rendering Lines in the Scene.
    Display disablePointRendering()
    Disables rendering points to the frame.
    Display disableScrollWheel()
    Disables the ability to change the camera's distance to its position with the scroll wheel.
    Display disableTextAliasing()
    Disables text aliasing (enables text anti-aliasing);
    Display disableTextAntialiasing()
    Disables text anti-aliasing (enables text aliasing).
    Display disableYAxisClamping()
    Disables clamping the y-axis viewing angle such that the user cannot move the camera past the y-axis.
    Display enableAliasing()
    Enables aliasing (disables anti-aliasing).
    Display enableAntialiasing()
    Enables anti-aliasing (disables aliasing).
    Display enableCameraPositionPrinting()
    Enables printing the camera's actual position to (0,11) or a user-specified point on the frame.

    Enables printing the camera's actual position to the user-specified point on the frame.

    Enables dithering.

    Display enableTextAntialiasing()
    Enables text anti-aliasing (disables text aliasing).

    Enables clamping the y-axis viewing angle such that the user cannot move the camera past the y-axis.

    • Display

      public Display​(com.emeryferrari.jse3d.obj.Scene scene, java.lang.String frameTitle, int maxPointsTotal, int maxPointsObject, int maxObjects)
      Parameters:
      scene - The scene that should be rendered by this Display object.
      frameTitle - The title of the frame created by this Display object.
      maxPointsTotal - The maximum number of points that will ever be in any Scene rendered.
      maxPointsObject - The maximum number of points that will ever be in any single Object3D.
      maxObjects - The maximum number of Object3Ds that will ever be in any Scene rendered.

    • Display

      public Display​(com.emeryferrari.jse3d.obj.Scene scene, java.lang.String frameTitle, boolean frameVisible, boolean renderPoints, java.awt.Dimension pointSize, int frameWidth, int frameHeight, int fps, double fovRadians, int maxPointsTotal, int maxPointsObject, int maxObjects)
